title: Make it easier to discover and exploit the `"tidyverse.quiet"` option
body:
I recently needed to use this in the R Packages book and went to the tidyverse package's pkgdown site for a refresher. We should make it easier to discover this option.

In R code:

``` r
options(tidyverse.quiet = TRUE)

withr::local_options(tidyverse.quiet = TRUE)
```

In a code chunk:

````
```{r}
#| R.options = list(tidyverse.quiet = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```
````

````
```{r somechunk, R.options = list(tidyverse.quiet = TRUE)}
library(tidyverse)
```
````
